Texts.Eng: A friend of mine gave me an ^orange;arm ring ^white;a few years back, as a token of our friendship. I've worn it ever since, but it fell from my arm the other day and now I can't find it! Could you look for it? ^green;I think it may have fallen into one of the pipes running through the lower parts of the ship.
Thank you for bringing my arm ring back to me! Here, take this, you've earned it!
